hosted_apps_urls.title: Obrew Studio
hosted_apps_urls.description: The main Obrew Studio interface for AI chat, agents, and workflows.

hosted_apps_urls.title: FileBuff
hosted_apps_urls.description: File management and knowledge base interface for your documents.

scripts.build-prod: pyinstaller --noconfirm --clean --onedir --windowed --log-level DEBUG --contents-directory _deps --icon backends/ui/favicon.ico --name Obrew-Studio --hidden-import tiktoken_ext.openai_public --hidden-import tiktoken_ext --add-data public:public/ --add-data package.json:public/ --add-data backends/ui/public:public/ --add-data .virtualenvs/myenv312/lib/site-packages/posthog:posthog/ --add-data .virtualenvs/myenv312/lib/site-packages/chromadb:chromadb/ --add-data .virtualenvs/myenv312/lib/site-packages/importlib_resources:importlib_resources/ --add-data .virtualenvs/myenv312/lib/site-packages/backoff:backoff/ --add-data .virtualenvs/myenv312/lib/site-packages/pypika:pypika/ --add-data .virtualenvs/myenv312/lib/site-packages/hnswlib.cp312-win_amd64.pyd:. backends/main.py
